author: Mehboob Jeelani
text:
At a time when the government has cracked down on the JNU, the BJP’s own ally in Jammu and Kashmir, the PDP still holds a view that Afzal Guru’s hanging was “a travesty of justice.”

Senior PDP leader Rafi Ahmed Mir told The Hindu that the party would not “deviate” from demanding Guru’s mortal remains, nor will it stop questioning the legal grounds of his hanging.

“Our stand will remain the same, come what may,” said Mr.Mir.
title: ‘Afzal’s hanging a travesty of justice’
